content.raw:
I’ll commit my changes to [here](#!/dihm/labscript_utils/src/feature-PyCaptureCamServer/) tomorrow.

But waiting is probably the best bet. I’m in full on thesis writing mode at the moment \(so time is limited\) and the preview for PointGrey needs some testing that is hard for me since we don’t really use it. It works fine for the other servers I’ve written \(Basler, Andor, Princeton Instruments\), but I changed the structure from what Dan has such that the implementation is a lot easier, making the backport more bug prone.
content.html:
I’ll commit my changes to here tomorrow.

But waiting is probably the best bet. I’m in full on thesis writing mode at the moment (so time is limited) and the preview for PointGrey needs some testing that is hard for me since we don’t really use it. It works fine for the other servers I’ve written (Basler, Andor, Princeton Instruments), but I changed the structure from what Dan has such that the implementation is a lot easier, making the backport more bug prone.
